channel.title: 317 Love2pk server devolopment
channel.description:
NOTE1: Tell me if im posting something wrong cause im new to server devolopment my first post here! NOTE2: Please tell me if theres any link or any advert here cause im not trying to advertise :| Love2pk!!!!!!!! [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/pic2.jpg[/img]
Home is varrock!!!!!!!!! (edited by me) Gladiotor arenas(edited by me) you can even go skieng throw snow balls (edited by me) Training is penguing (edited by me) Upgraded whips and all special gses like "fallen angel"(edited by me) upgraded new Npc's Edited by me. Quests and new minigames like Gold Box "edited by me" Over 1m customs "edited by me" Max level is 148 "edited by me!!!"[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 11, 2009, 04:37:49 am[/size][hr]What do you think i should add?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 11, 2009, 04:39:05 am[/size][hr]Most of the pics have client links so i removed atleast 3 :(

@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“123kdd100, post:5, topic:283255”]Well your right,
altogether they’re 5000 customs but i worked on my server ALOT It took me over 2 years.
Just wish me good luck
I said 1m customs cause its just an expretion.[/quote]
Customs ruin a server, in my opinion.
